bitmusic.network.main

Class ThreadManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • bitmusic.network.main.ThreadManager

  • public final class ThreadManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates and manages workers on-demand.

      • assignTaskToWorker

        public void assignTaskToWorker(java.net.Socket socket)
        Creates a worker (thread) and initiate it with a socket. The task will be scheduled and executed if there is an available thread in the pool. One message = one job = one worker At the end of run(), the worker destroys itself.
        Parameters:
        socket - socket treated as a task

      • assignTaskToDatagramWorker

        public void assignTaskToDatagramWorker(java.net.DatagramSocket socket)
                                throws NetworkException
        Method used to assign a task to DatagramWorker.
        Parameters:
        socket - The opened socket
        Throws:
        NetworkException - Send a NetworkException

      • assignTaskToHermes

        public void assignTaskToHermes(AbstractMessage task)
        Creates an hermes messenger (thread) and initiate it with a message. The task will be scheduled and executed if there is an available thread in the pool. One message = one job = one hermes messenger At the end of run(), the hermes destroys itself.
        Parameters:
        task - Message to deal with
